categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Bail Antilles was an alias that was used by a male individual during the Galactic Civil War.

This individual worked for the Alliance to Restore the Republic and used the alias "Bail Antilles" while posing as a bounty hunter, during a mission to extract the spy Malkor Trel from the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Executor.
